page.title: 15Arts and Crafts-Witton
page.content: A variety of arts & crafts are pursued.These hobbies include soft toy making,lampshades,embroidery,pewter work,crochet,bobbin lace,weaving & spinning,composing music & water colour painting.At Mill Common an ocean going handbuilt sailing boat is nearing completion,one man's spare time occupation for the last 5 years. It is built of wood,all the wood being prepared from tree trunks.Her graceful lines can be seen as people pass by. The builder is a trained boat builder though this enterprise is a hobby. {Recreation}There are no organised sports in this area:there is no playing field.Youngsters go to Mundesley & N.Walsham for team sports. Hobbies include gardening,shooting, horse riding & archery.
